1.0.name: wordpress/netflix-rss-feeder
1.0.description:
Netflix RSS Feeder is a WordPress plugin to display your Netflix's List of At Homes, Queue, Recommendations, Reviews, Notifications and Watch Instantly Queue on your blog sidebar. Also, it's widgetized.

Requirements: Up to Wordpress Version 3.1, A NetFlix account.
